```{r}
library(tidyverse)

#The variable my_data is a global variable that contains all the records of the Avocado Prices Dataset
#Summary Statistics for Numeric Variables
nrow(my_data)
my_data %>% select_if(is.numeric) %>% summary()

#Standard Deviation for Each Numeric Variable
sd(my_data$AveragePrice)
sd(my_data$`Total Volume`)
sd(my_data$`4046`)
sd(my_data$`4225`)
sd(my_data$`4770`)
sd(my_data$`Total Bags`)
sd(my_data$`Small Bags`)
sd(my_data$`Large Bags`)
sd(my_data$`XLarge Bags`)
